description.value: You are as at home in the treetops as you are beneath their branches. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet when moving through trees, vines, and other foliage. Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to Climb a tree or an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] on a branch, you get a critical success instead. You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] while Climbing or Balancing on a tree.
